## About me

My name is Tien Nguyen, and I am a graduate student in the [Master of Data Science program at UBC Vancouver](https://masterdatascience.ubc.ca). I hold a Bachelor's degree in Statistics with a strong foundation in Computer Science, having gained significant experience in programming languages such as Python and R throughout my academic journey. My expertise lies in data manipulation, visualization, and applying machine learning techniques to real-world problems. During my time at the UBC Cloud Innovation Centre, I further honed my skills by developing data processing pipelines, building business intelligence dashboards, and working on machine learning models. I am passionate about leveraging my skills to solve complex problems and drive data-driven solutions across various industries.
